alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Borden; Crane; Dawson; Ector; Gaines; Glasscock; Howard; Martin; Midland; Mitchell; Reagan; Scurry; Upton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued March 17 at 7:45PM CDT until March 17 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Glasscock County in western Texas... Eastern Andrews County in western Texas... Scurry County in western Texas... Midland County in western Texas... Northeastern Crane County in western Texas... Dawson County in western Texas... Eastern Ector County in western Texas... Mitchell County in western Texas... Reagan County in western Texas... Eastern Gaines County in western Texas... Borden County in western Texas... Howard County in western Texas... Martin County in western Texas... Upton County in western Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 744 PM CDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Gail to near Coahoma to Garden City to near Odessa, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Less than three miles visibility with localized visibility at one mile or less and strong winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Satellite. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 104 and 228. Locations impacted include... Midland, Odessa, Big Spring, Snyder, Andrews, Lamesa, Colorado City, Crane, Big Lake, Rankin, Ackerly, Greenwood, Gail, Garden City, Stanton, Coahoma, Loraine, Forsan, Sand Springs and Lomax. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

area.areaDesc: Andrews; Borden; Crane; Dawson; Ector; Gaines; Glasscock; Howard; Martin; Midland; Mitchell; Reagan; Scurry; Upton
